Sign In Enter Password Reset Password There are no security questions set for this account.\n\nIf you wish to reset your password, you must erase all data in the database. Information deleted this way will not be recovered.\n\n Are you sure you want to proceed? Create Password Create A New Password Re-Enter Password Password must be at least 6 characters long and contain a letter, number and symbol Passwords do not match Enter Password If you wish to reset your password and security questions, you must erase all data in the database. Information deleted this way will not be recovered.\n\n Are you sure you want to proceed? Security code is blank, please try again Incorrect security code, please try again Security code correct, wiping database information and login information Please enter in the security code to wipe the database information. This code can be found inside the user manual.\n\nOnce you confirm the security code, the reset will happen immediately.\n\n Security Code The answers to the security questions are incorrect, please try again

Disclaimer "Neurolab by Soteria is designed as an assistant tool only.\nIt should not be relied upon for treatment, diagnosis or professional medical advice.\nIf you have any queries about its use, please consult your local physician or health care provider.\n\nBy accessing and using this app, you have confirmed that you have read, understood and accepted the above statement." neurolabPrefs
